titleStmt.title: The seauen spirituall exercises of a deuout soule Containing the life and death of our sauiour Christ: compiled in seauen meditations, replenished with most godly, and deuout motions, and seruing for the seauen dayes in the weeke.
titleStmt.author: Bull, John, fl. 1613, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Iohn Budge, and are to be solde at the great south-doore of Paules, and at Britaines Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
